clueGame

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • clueGame.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

    Player

    This class stores all the information relevant to the players in the game.
    Since:
    2017-11-02
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Adam Nelson, Youjun Lee

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Default constructor.

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String playerName,
              java.awt.Color color,
              int row,
              int column)
        Parameterized Constructor that creates a new player from a data file, and initializes an empty hand.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the player.
        color - The player's identifying color.
        row - The row of the player's starting location.
        column - The column of the player's starting location.

    • Method Detail

      • disproveSuggestion

        public Card disproveSuggestion(Solution suggestion)
        Reveals a suggested card to the player making the suggestion.
        Parameters:
        suggestion - The proposed suggestion, e.g. PERSON did it with the WEAPON in the ROOM.
        Returns:
        Card A suggested card that the player contains in their hand.

      • addCard

        public void addCard(Card c)
        Adds a card to the player's hand.
        Parameters:
        c - The card to be added.

      • addSeen

        public void addSeen(Card c)
        Adds a card to a set of seen cards so the player does not include it in future suggestions.
        Parameters:
        c - The card revealed to the player.
